docs.snippet: Chris Bassitt pitched into the eighth inning for his first major league win, and the Chicago White Sox slowed Detroit's chase of the AL Central title with a 2-0 victory over the Tigers on Monday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Bassitt pitched into the eighth inning for his first major league win, and the Chicago White Sox slowed Detroit's chase of the AL Central title with a 2-0 victory over the Tigers on Monday night.

headline.main: Bassitt and White Sox Slow Down Tigers, 2-0
headline.print_headline: Bassitt and White Sox Slow Down Tigers, 2-0

docs.snippet: After one of their own was killed and another wounded, law enforcement officers have taken to the Pennsylvania forest to find the person responsible....
docs.lead_paragraph: After one of their own was killed and another wounded, law enforcement officers have taken to the Pennsylvania forest to find the person responsible.
docs.abstract: Dan Barry This Land column examines acutely personal manhunt undertaken by the Pennsylvania State Police for Eric M Frein, marksman believed to have assassinated one state trooper and wounded another; notes that search, over dozens of square miles in heavily forested area, has been especially disruptive to quiet life in region.

headline.main: In Tense Woods, Pennsylvania State Police Shift From Prey to Hunters
headline.print_headline: In Tense Woods, Police Shift From Prey to Hunters

docs.snippet: A pastor’s nearly nine-year battle to close a strip club has succeeded in getting the dancers to his church on Sundays, albeit as part of a topless protest against him....
docs.lead_paragraph: A pastor’s nearly nine-year battle to close a strip club has succeeded in getting the dancers to his church on Sundays, albeit as part of a topless protest against him.
docs.abstract: Topless protesters are demonstrating outside New Beginnings Ministries in Warsaw, Ohio, in response to pastor William R Dunfee's protests outside local strip club for past nine years; pastor vows to go on with his vigils that led to dancers picketing church.

headline.main: From Pole to Pulpit, a Club and a Church Do Battle
headline.print_headline: From Pole to Pulpit, a Strip Club and a Church Do Battle
